title: I've just been wondering something...
content:
In Commander Keen 5: Goodbye Galaxy, when you reach the final room of the Forbidden Pyriamid, if you duck down and look below, there is another Oracle doorway below. However, the foot is in the way, and as of all I tried there is no way to get past the foot.

I have the registered version of it on my other computer, and have not tried the Forbidden Pyramid on it yet, but on the computer I was using when I completed the Forbidden Pyramid, it was the unregistered. That might have something to do with it.

Anyways, if any of you have any information on how to get down there, help would be appriciated! Thanks![img]http://server5.uploadit.org/files2/231203-dbsupport.gif[/img]

title: Re: I've just been wondering something...
content: You're talking about Keen 4.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img] Anyways, the doorway you see below when you are near the foot, is the same you just entered to the big room where the Oracle was.. You can't get past the foot. There would be nothing more than room that you've already gone past in order to get to the foot.You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: I've just been wondering something...
content:
Heh heh... I didnt realise that. I feel like a fool now [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img]

Thanks Anyways![img]http://server5.uploadit.org/files2/231203-dbsupport.gif[/img]

title: Re: I've just been wondering something...

content:

[url=http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/encyclopedia/maps/maps-k4-lvl14.html]www.classicgaming.com/cc3...lvl14.html[/url]Retodon8
